name: Snow Haven
description:
This is my first fully developed solo game. It's playable on Oculus Quest!

In Snow Haven, you throw snowballs at snowmen that spawn randomly.

With a limited number of snowballs and endless snowmen, the object is to last as long as possible and rack up points!

Its a sort of roguelike, being able to progress to a harder and more challenging level after a certain amount of points, but there's no requirement to.
